30year-line1: Establish the Advertising Service and Fair Center, specializing in Design and Print-Ads services, OOH, Fair and Event organizing, implementing communication services such as producing TVCs, launching the communication campaign …
30year-line2.1: - Establish Duong Phong Advertising and Trading Co., Ltd. specializing in providing design, printing, outdoor advertising services, and manufacturing advertising equipment.
30year-line2.2: - DPA’s mechanical Workshop founded, specialized in building large format billboards, light boxes and producing point of sale materials.
30year-line3: Construction of Duong Phong Printing house with area of 700m2. Our main products: Print-ads, Calendar, Books.
30year-line4: Our Printing Factory is upgraded to 6,000m2; more types of printing and packaging machinery updated to diversify our categories of service and capacity
30year-line5: Updating new techniques is continuously in both Mechanical Workshop and Printing Factory by purchasing new types of machines. Targeting in automation in 70% of the production stages.
30year-line6: We aim to be a Green Manufacturing Enterprise.
text-about1: Our printing factory provide full services for printing products:
text-about2: Design – Pre-printing- Printing – Post Printing – Delivery on nationwide.
text-about3: We are the supplier of packs and boxes with FSC materials in Vietnam.
text-about4: We are also reliable suppliers in graphic design, production of POSM, booths in supermarkets, exhibitions, and showrooms on nationwide.
text-about5: DPA people are highly skilled and dedicated ones.
